content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] We did not agree on a final price because the landlord was seeking a higher price than the 720 Euro per month that I was offering. I did not want to continue the negotiation at a price that was not acceptable to me.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 7.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] If my answer was "Yes", I would explain why I felt discriminated or offended. However, in this case, I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Yi-Nuo
